StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMCFOPMassEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT --[MCFOPMassEventID] --me table --me.[FiscalYear], might need .scal year in this table me.[MCFOPMassEventID] AS MCFOPEventID
,me.[Organiza.onEventID],me.[AirportName],me.[MediaTypeID], me.[Adver.singInfo],
--oe table hs.SCHOOL_CODE As SchoolCode, hs.ROWGUID as SchoolRowGuid, hs.HighSchool_Name As CollegeName, @FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, oe.[EventDate], --[Organiza.onID] ,[Organiza.onType] oe.[Remarks],
--pc table
pc.[PointOfContactID], [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName],[POCFirstName],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName,
pc.[Street1], pc.[Street2],pc.[City],pc.[State],pc.[ZipCode], pc.[TelephoneNumber],pc.[CellPhoneNumber],pc.[FaxNumber],pc.[EmailAddress], pc.CITY_CODE, pc.COUNTY_CODE, pc.STATE_CODE
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[MCFOPMassEvent] me inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON me.[Organiza.onEventID] = oe.[Organiza.onEventID] and oe.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.[PointOfContactID] = oe.[PointOfContactID]
inner join High_School hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = oe.CollegeID and hs.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
